allow: Bash(python3 -c " import json, sys data = json.load\(sys.stdin\) text = data[0][''text''] obj = json.loads\(text\) exec_data = obj[''data''] # Get final node output for node_name, node_data in exec_data.get\(''data'', {}\).get\(''resultData'', {}\).get\(''runData'', {}\).items\(\): if ''Respond'' in node_name or ''Formatear'' in node_name: for run in node_data: for item in run.get\(''data'', {}\).get\(''main'', [[]]\)[0]: print\(f''=== {node_name} ===''\) print\(json.dumps\(item.get\(''json'', {}\), indent=2, ensure_ascii=False\)[:3000]\) ")
